author: AP
title: The well-traveled Sungjae Im learning to stay in one place
description: No one plays as much on the PGA Tour as rising star Sungjae Im
content:
Sungjae Im has played in nine countries and 19 U.S. states since his rookie season on the PGA Tour, moving from hotel to hotel during the most prolific schedule among top players in golf. 
Being in one spot for so long because of the coronavirus pandemic is … [+6977 chars]
